answers.answer: The Vagas nerve runs through there.  It also runs around the heart and down past the stomach.  When I used to get colitis, it felt like a muscle spasm.  Mylanta stopped it.  If it isn't from that, Mylanta won't help, but it might be worth a try.

question: I have muscle spasm in or around the ribs on both sides (in the front under the breast), it feels like a ball rolling. I only know that when I relax and Stretch my arm (the side where the knot is) over my head and wait till it goes away, any help, Thank you Donna
title: muscle spasm and discomfort
